DataElement.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Other Reason Periodontium Physical Examination Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free text field for other reason for assessment in dental practice of the fibrous connective tissue surrounding the root of a tooth that separates it from and attaches it to the alveolar bone.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Other Reason Periodontium Physical Examination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to other reason for assessment of the fibrous connective tissue surrounding the root of a tooth that separates it from and attaches it to the alveolar bone in the dental practice.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:No value exists.:A physical examination is a systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion, and auscultation, aimed to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for individual's health assessment.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
The fibrous connective tissue surrounding the root of a tooth that separates it from and attaches it to the alveolar bone.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.
